name: retso-marketplace
description: Custom marketplace for Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: code-review-tools
plugins.description: Review code changes commit-by-commit with custom rules support. Includes interactive setup and rule creation.

plugins.name: github-tools
plugins.description: GitHub workflow tools for daily development. Analyze PR review comments and categorize what needs fixing.

plugins.name: spec-kit
plugins.description: Spec-Driven Development toolkit for Claude Code. Create specifications, plans, and tasks following a structured workflow from requirements to implementation.
